description.html:
The bitbucket pull request API has been released. This pull request fixes the last breakages (/patch replaced with /diff, #933) and adds a few features.

$ bitbucket_pullrequests -h
Usage: bitbucket_pullrequests [options]
    -l, --list                       List open pull requests with fields:
                                     [id] [source] [dest] [branch]
    -c, --check [id]
    -d, --diff [id]                  Show diff from pull request
    -f, --files [id]                 Show changed files in a pull request
    -s, --summary [id]               Summarize a pull request with fields:
                                     [id] [source] [dest] [branch]
    -u, --show-url                   Show urls accessed
    -v, --verbose                    Verbose output
    -h, --help                       Display this help message

New features:

  • -d, --diff: Print a diff for the pull request
  • -u, --url: Print the urls accessed by the tool
  • -v, --verbose: Print the raw JSON received from bitbucket
# --diff
$ ./bitbucket_pullrequests --diff 840
diff -r c5b1d48b8aeebf7e1ae801ef7542ec75312088d0 -r 0676064f7ae2ef9e6c7416e6b0b244a372cc954f test/integration/multicamera_sensor.cc
--- a/test/integration/multicamera_sensor.cc
+++ b/test/integration/multicamera_sensor.cc
@@ -61,11 +61,8 @@
   }

   // get two cameras, one with rotation and one without.
-  std::string modelUnrotated = "cam_x_rot_test_unrotated_cameras_1";
   std::string cameraUnrotated = "multicamera_sensor_unrotated";
-  std::string modelRotated1 = "cam_x_rot_test_rotated_cameras_1";
   std::string cameraRotated1 = "multicamera_sensor_rotated1";
-  std::string modelRotated2 = "cam_x_rot_test_rotated_cameras_2";
   std::string cameraRotated2 = "multicamera_sensor_rotated2";

   sensors::SensorPtr sensor = sensors::get_sensor(cameraUnrotated);

# --url
$ ./bitbucket_pullrequests --url -s 840
https://bitbucket.org/api/2.0/repositories/osrf/gazebo/pullrequests/840
  840    e072b20a8684    c5b1d48b8aee    fix_cppcheck_warnings

# --verbose
$ ./bitbucket_pullrequests --verbose -s 840
{
  "description": "\r\n```\r\n#!c++\r\n\r\n[test/integration/multicamera_sensor.cc:64]: (style) Variable 'modelUnrotated' is assigned a value that is never used\r\n[test/integration/multicamera_sensor.cc:66]: (style) Variable 'modelRotated1' is assigned a value that is never used\r\n[test/integration/multicamera_sensor.cc:68]: (style) Variable 'modelRotated2' is assigned a value that is never used\r\nTotal errors found: 0\r\n```\r\n",
  "links": {
    "decline": {
      "href": "https://bitbucket.org/api/2.0/repositories/osrf/gazebo/pullrequests/840/decline"
    },
...
    "approve": {
      "href": "https://bitbucket.org/api/2.0/repositories/osrf/gazebo/pullrequests/840/approve"
    }
  },
  "title": "Remove cppcheck warnings.",
  "close_source_branch": true,
  "reviewers": [

  ],
  "destination": {
    "commit": {
      "hash": "c5b1d48b8aee",
      "links": {
        "self": {
          "href": "https://bitbucket.org/api/2.0/repositories/osrf/gazebo/commit/c5b1d48b8aee"
        }
      }
    },
...
}
  840    e072b20a8684    c5b1d48b8aee    fix_cppcheck_warnings

title.html: Re-fix #933, bitbucket_pullrequests tool

title: Re-fix #933, bitbucket_pullrequests tool
